overview: The New York Philharmonic celebrates the dazzling orchestral world of Stephen Sondheim in a program hosted by Bernadette Peters, with special guest vocalist Katrina Lenk. Conducted by Alexander Gemignani, the concert features some of Sondheimâ€™s most beloved works, including suites from Sunday in the Park, Into the Woods, Sweeney Todd and more.
title: Celebrating Sondheim
